kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_10: And put them in the right place
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_11: After everything is ready, you need to send it a redstone signal
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_13: After waiting for a period of time, you will receive one of the following two items
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_17: You can only guess their ratio again
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_2: For this, you need to prepare a structure
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_20: The equipment in this saves will not change
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_3: Next, you need to place a Beam Cannon
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_4: Beam Cannon must face Exchange Tablet
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_5: And you must give energy to Beam Cannon
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_6: The upper part of it contains materials
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_7: And put the aspectus in the lower part
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.text_9: You must guess the ratio of each aspectus from JEI
kubejs.ponder.precision_assembly_machine: There is no need to bind any inputs or outputs
kubejs.ponder.starlight_infuser.text_2: Here the port can be replaced with any port
